body.content:
My dear Eve,

I am happy for your response, however, I will tell you that God will give
you the strength to carry on this and finalize it In Jesus name. I do not
have much time due to my illness leukaemia Cancer. You are to share this
money with my Son immediately when he is grown up.

It is obvious we do not know each other much for me trusting you with the
safety of my fund and debursing with my Son when old enough. That, I leave
to God for he knows the best. WE have to do what we can as human beings but
God knows the best. The mails I send to you are done by my private Nurse. I
can only reply to your emails when she finds me strong doing so.

When I get your response, I shall send you the email address of my attorney
so that you two can work amicably in the realization of my fund into your
account And presenting you as the beneficiary. You are to corporating with
him fully making it a success. Do Note my dear, that the fund is in Joint
Account. That was the agreement between me and my late husband and since
his death, no death certificate has been issued to the bank of his demise.
All these you are to work with the attorney and other paper works needed
which the attorney will make known when you are in contact with him.

 I am very weak and might not last long now but will have to plead not to
let me down as I count on you that when I die, I go in peace believing you
will keep to your words which I am counting on.

I will have to advise you not to delay in responding as it might give me
the chance of sourcing for another individual for this same purpose due to
my short time.

Sincerely,
Mrs Flora Luiz.

header.subject: Re: How can i help with this?
